comment: Lord I turn to you in an ugly world . So many natural disasters going on . So many angry people . I know Lord that You want us to turn to You during this time . I know You have hardened hearts and are waiting to see where faith remains . My faith is strong with you Lord . Protect us ! <URL>
amr:
# ::snt Lord I turn to you in an ugly world . So many natural disasters going on . So many angry people . I know Lord that You want us to turn to You during this time . I know You have hardened hearts and are waiting to see where faith remains . My faith is strong with you Lord . Protect us ! <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / turn-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG2 (y / you)
            :location (w / world
                  :mod (u / ugly)))
      :snt2 (n / natural-disaster
            :ARG1-of (g / go-on-15)
            :ARG1-of (h / have-quant-91
                  :ARG2 (m2 / many)
                  :ARG3 (s / so)))
      :snt3 (p / person
            :ARG1-of (a / anger-01)
            :ARG1-of (h2 / have-quant-91
                  :ARG2 (m3 / many)
                  :ARG3 (s2 / so)))
      :snt4 (k / know-01
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG1 (w2 / want-01
                  :ARG0 (y2 / you)
                  :ARG1 (t2 / turn-01
                        :ARG0 (w3 / we)
                        :ARG2 y2
                        :time (t3 / time
                              :mod (t4 / this))))
            :ARG2 (p2 / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Lord")))
      :snt5 (k2 / know-01
            :ARG0 ii2
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (b / break-heart-31
                        :ARG0 y2)
                  :op2 (w4 / wait-01
                        :ARG1 y2
                        :ARG2 (s3 / see-01
                              :ARG0 y2
                              :ARG1 (l / location
                                    :location-of (f / faith
                                          :ARG1-of (r / remain-01)))))))
      :snt6 (s4 / strong-02
            :ARG1 (f2 / faith
                  :poss (ii3 / i))
            :prep-with p2)
      :snt7 (p3 / protect-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y3 / you)
            :ARG1 (w5 / we)))

comment: Yes . " Be strong and bold ; have no fear or dread of them , because it is the Lord your God who goes with you ; he will not fail you or forsake you . " Deuteronomy :6
amr:
# ::snt Yes . " Be strong and bold ; have no fear or dread of them , because it is the Lord your God who goes with you ; he will not fail you or forsake you . " Deuteronomy :6
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (y / yes)
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (s / strong-02

                  :ARG1 (y2 / you))
            :op2 (b / bold-02

                  :ARG0 y2))
      :snt3 (h / have-03

            :ARG0 (y3 / you)

                  :op2 (d / dread-01

            :ARG1-of (c / cause-01

                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Lord")
                              :ARG0-of (h2 / have-rel-role-91

      :snt4 (o2 / or

            :op2 (f3 / forsake-01

      :snt5 (v / verse
